field.name: interval
field.label: Interval (sec)
field.description: Wait time until the next slide change

field.name: pauseOnHover
field.label: pauseOnHover
field.description: Determines whether to pause autoplay on mouseover or not

field.name: gap
field.label: gap
field.description: The gap between slides. The CSS format is acceptable, such as 1em or 5px. Do NOT use pure numbers, such as 0 or 5! Use 0px or 5px instead!

field.name: width
field.label: width
field.description: The slider MAX width, accepting CSS formats such as 10em, 80vw, 65%, 100%, 650px and so on. Do NOT use pure numbers, such as 65 or 650! Leave empty for no maximum width.
